HOMLI PRESENTS THIS WONDERFUL PROPERTY! This charming detached villa is located in the picturesque town of Colmenar de Oreja, just a few kilometers from Madrid. Situated in a quiet residential area, the villa offers a relaxing atmosphere and an excellent quality of life. The exterior of the property stands out for its classic and elegant style. The facade is clad with cement in warm tones, while the gable roof adds a traditional touch. The villa is surrounded by a large private garden, carefully designed and with a variety of plants and trees that create a green and pleasant environment. The garden also has a lawn area ideal for outdoor enjoyment, as well as a private swimming pool that invites you to relax on hot summer days. When accessing the interior of the house, we find a spacious entrance hall leading to the different areas of the house. The villa has a comfortable and functional layout, with ample spaces and abundant natural light in all rooms. The marble floors and the careful selection of materials confer a refined and high quality style. The main living room is the heart of the house, a cozy and bright space with large windows that allow you to enjoy the views of the garden. Next to the living room, there is a separate dining room, perfect for entertaining guests and celebrating special occasions. The kitchen is fully equipped with modern appliances and offers an additional area for breakfast or an informal meal. Stylish finishes, built-in cabinets and ample work surface make this kitchen an ideal place for foodies. The villa also has several bedrooms, all of which are bright and spacious, with built-in closets and large windows. The bathrooms are designed in a modern and elegant style, equipped with high quality sanitary ware and top quality finishes. In short, this detached villa in Colmenar de Oreja combines the tranquility of a residential location with the elegance and comfort of a high quality home. With its large garden, bright spaces and luxury finishes, this property is the perfect place to enjoy a quiet and comfortable life in a natural environment.

[WE DO NOT CHARGE COMMISSION TO THE BUYER] FYSOL Inmobiliarias exclusively offers you this magnificent independent villa designed and built only with top quality.It is located in the Balcón del Tajo Oeste Urbanization that belongs to the municipality of Colmenar de Oreja (Madrid); 10-15 minutes from the city of Aranjuez and about 40-45 minutes from Madrid.The urbanization has 24-hour monitored access control. The house is located in the entrance area of the urbanization on a plot of more than 800m2.At the entrance of the property, with pedestrian and vehicle access, we find a garden area, the barbecue (practically brand new), a rest area and a table ideal for breakfast, coffee, etc...On one side of the house there is access for vehicles and on the opposite side you can access the main garden on foot through a beautiful access. Entering the chalet there is a large hall that gives access to the staircase on the lower floor and the living room, which is very bright, as it has windows on both sides of its walls.To the right of the entrance and through the hallway, the rooms appear; four in total (one of them is currently used as an office prepared to install a full kitchen if desired) and two complete bathrooms: one with a shower and the other with a bathtub (both with natural ventilation). The lower floor is at the level of the rear garden. The first thing we find is a beautiful kitchen with an island and a dining room, as well as a seating area in front of the fireplace.Behind the kitchen there is a full bathroom with a shower and then access to the garage that has an attached bedroom that is currently used as a study and gym.Going out through the kitchen to the patio and covered by a wonderful wooden pergola, there is an area that can be used as an outdoor dining area, relaxation and leisure area, etc...Further on, the pool area with a part for sunbathing or/and resting on Balinese-type beds and the pool itself. In terms of qualities, the property has top-of-the-line materials and furniture both outside and inside.Interior: Wooden floors, double-glazed PVC windows, smooth walls, built-in wardrobes, oil boiler heating, fireplace, split air conditioning, gym machines, fully equipped kitchen, several flat screen televisions.Exterior: Motorized vehicle gate, electricity and water points throughout the plot (lighting on the porch and umbrellas), built-in barbecue and another mobile one, water softener, garden furniture (armchairs, sun loungers, teak wood tables and chairs, motorized garage door, freezers, diesel boiler with 1000L tank, pool purifier less than a year old. The property is transmitted as is with all exterior and interior furniture (except for some personal items).This home is among the best in the entire urbanization; request a visit.

Inmohappy offers for sale this wonderful recreational farm "EL SOTO DEL PARRAL" just 45 minutes from Madrid, 40 hectares around the Tagus river, with wonderful leafy trees and a private lake. It has been exploited for the realization of leisure and adventure activities as well as rural tourism and events (Danco adventure park in the trees). It has 2.247 meters built (306 residential, 1462 warehouse 1, 383 Warehouse 2, 96 others). In this area there are the structures of the main house and the two long naves as well as a wooden house on top of a tree that gives it a special charm. It also has a swimming pool and recreation area with a private lake. All the building of the farm is for total reform. Ideal to create a rural tourism complex since the enclave is idyllic. It has irrigation rights but the irrigation is not mounted. It has 3 water wells and abundant water from the confederation that comes through a canal. The owners are reclaiming the rights to the CAP. Farm with a very high leisure component combined with agricultural profitability to make it to the taste of the buyer.
